field.name: MinAngle
field.desc: Min angle the part can rotate[degrees]

field.name: MaxAngle
field.desc: Max angle the part can rotate[degrees]

field.name: ImpulseModifier
field.desc: Scale applied on the angular acceleration of the part[0,+

field.name: Damping
field.desc: Scale applied to the gravity strength pushing the part at the balance ratio[0,1]

field.name: BalanceRatio
field.desc: Ratio locating the target angle of the gravity[0,1]

field.name: AccelSquareLengthForImpulse
field.desc: Square length needed on acceleration to impact the logic hinge.
